text:
@holly_cummins @Purity_Birir @hot_girl_spring @monkchips @edeandrea "Branded t-shirts are a standard speaker uniform at conferences" came here to write the same:) 
Thank you for talking about this. I hope we'll live to see the time when everyone feels comfortable dressing and looking the way they feel inside.

author.name: Аlina Yurenko 🇺🇦
author.description: Ukrainian. Love tech, open source and compilers. Developer Advocate @GraalVM @OracleLabs. Open Source @Oracle. @GoogleDevGroups. UA: @alinayrn. Support 🇺🇦⬇️
